Barankinya Gosta (1935–1998) bụ onye a ma ama na Zimbabwe na-akpụ ihe na Chewa.
Ọ bụ nwa afọ Mozambique, Barankinya Gosta bụ onye bi na obodo Tengenenge Sculpture Community nke a ma ama na Zimbabwe
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ osisi, nke ọ na-ese; ụdị ya sitere na nke eji eme ihe mkpuchi ma ọdịnala Chewa.
Ọrụ Barankinya Gosta dị na nchịkọta nke Chapungu Sculpture Park.
